entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Baie-Saint-Paul
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap Tourmente 1:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: W 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
